medium: Brown ink and pen, brown wash, white heightening on paper
provenance: La Société historique et littéraire polonaise, Paris (until 1972, sale, Christie's, London, July 4, 1972, lot 48 (group lot of 3 drawings by Fancelli, including "Study of Orpheus and Eurydice" [73.35.1a,b]), to O'Brien; [Shepherd Gallery, New York, in 1973; sold to MIA]
title: The Death of Lucretia
